      • applyRule

        void applyRule(@Nonnull
               Resource scoreRule,
               @Nonnull
               Resource subRule,
               @Nonnull
               java.lang.String verb,
               @Nullable
               java.lang.String topic,
               @Nonnull
               java.lang.String userId,
               @Nonnull
               Resource ugcResource,
               @Nonnull
               Resource componentResource)
        Calcuate score based on engine's algorithm.
        Parameters:
        scoreRule - scoringRule resource
        subRule - The scoring sub rule resource
        verb - The action verb from a SocialEvent
        topic - The topic from a SocialEvent
        userId - The user the score should apply to
        ugcResource - The UGC resource used for the scoring calculation
        componentResource - The component where the rule is located

java.lang.String getScoringType()

        Process UGC for scoring even though no rule was defined.
        Parameters:
        ruleAction - The event's action verb
        ugcResource - The UGC resource used for the scoring calculation
